title: DRP (SRA) shall adopt the procedure laid down in the MR&TP Act, 1966 for giving building permission to any development in DRP under this Scheme
clause_text: DRP (SRA) shall adopt the procedure laid down in the MR&TP Act, 1966 for giving building permission to any development in DRP under this Scheme.
section: Building Permission under Dharavi Redevelopment Project:
